components.title: Jeans

description: Denim jeans, worn by men or women. A popular form of casual trousers worn by the runner emoji in Apple's emoji artwork
title: Jeans

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Clothing and accessories
emoji_net_data.definition: Denim jeans, worn by men or women. A popular form of casual trousers worn by the runner emoji in Apple's emoji artwork Jeans was approved as http://emojipedia.org/jeans/
emoji_net_data.name: jeans

bn:00006125n: Clothing is material used to cover parts of the human body for protection against the environment, for comfort and body modesty, and as personal decoration, often reflecting religious, cultural, and social customs.
Clothing is fiber and textile material worn on the body.
All coverings designed to be worn on a person's body.
Something that can be worn; an item of clothing.
A covering of or like clothing.
An act or instance of putting clothes on.
A covering designed to be worn on a person's body
Fiber and textile material worn on the body

bn:00071230n: The commodities purchased from storeswomen carrying home shopping didn't give me a second glance"
A retailer or shop is a business that presents a selection of goods or services and offers to sell them to customers for money or other goods.

bn:00033731n: Fashion refers to styles of dress that are popular in a culture at any given time.
The latest and most admired style in clothes and cosmetics and behavior
Term for a popular style or practice in clothing, make-up, furniture, etc.
The latest and most admired style in clothes and cosmetics and behavior.
Fashion is a popular style or practice, especially in clothing, footwear, accessories, makeup, body piercing, or furniture.
A prevailing mode of expression, e.g., clothing

bn:03371570n: Trousers often made from denim or dungaree cloth
A pair of trousers made from denim cotton.
Pants made of denim that are a popular casual dress around the world.
Jeans are trousers often made from denim or dungaree cloth.
A pair of trousers made from denim cotton and dyed dark blue.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the jeans emoji presents a classic pair of denim trousers with a realistic texture and a pleasingly soft, worn-in appearance. The 3D shading and subtle gradients on the fabric create a sense of depth and tactile reality, a hallmark of Apple's design language. With their neatly folded legs and the distinct stitching visible, these jeans, as seen on Apple devices, evoke casual comfort, everyday style, or a relaxed vibe in digital communication.
